title: FURNISHED SHORT TERM OK -Central Denver, walk Downtown, Utilities Incl
neighborhood: Governor's Park ~ Central Denver ~ So. Cap Hill
posting_body: ["Ad comes down when rented.. Short term available between $1,650 and $1,850 see below.. Completely Furnished Unit - Great Location in South Capitol Hill / Governor's Park / West Wash Park!!", ' Rent includes all utilities for one tenant.', '835 Sherman Street, Denver, CO 80203', '$1650', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Year Built:', '1950', 'Sq Footage:', '550 sqft.', 'Bedrooms:', '1 Bed', 'Bathrooms:', '1 Bath', 'Parking:', 'Add Garage: $125/mo (wait list)', 'Lease Duration:', '6+ months', 'Deposit:', '$600', 'Pets Policy:', 'Small pets ok with fees listed on application', 'Laundry:', 'Onsite Shared', 'Floor:', '1st', 'Property Type:', 'Apartment', 'DESCRIPTION', "HILLSIDE APARTMENTS in Capitol Hill / GOVERNOR'S PARK, Great Central Denver / Governors Park Location, 5 Minutes to Downtown Business District and Washington Park, Security Building with Intercom System, ONE Bedroom Apartment with Approx 550SF, Separate Living Area with Big Windows and Views, Kitchen with newer grey cabinets, gas stove and apartment size refrigerator, full bathroom with tub, shower and vanity ~ 50's Era Deco tile, Common Area Laundry Onsite, machines operate via phone app - no coins!", 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Living room', 'Stove / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Yard', 'Lawn', 'Central heat', 'Ceiling fans', 'Cable-ready', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES', 'Secured entry', 'Garage - Attached (wait list)', 'LEASE OPTIONS', '3 Months - $1,850/month', '4-5 Months - $1,750/month', '6+ Months $1,650/month', 'Keywords: Central Denver, Cap Hill, Capitol Hill, Wash Park, Downtown Denver, Walk, Lightrail, Light rail, security building, garage, laundry']
